caption.p: The effect of different concentrations of glucose on intracellular reactive oxygen species (ROS). Relative intracellular ROS level was performed using a microplate reader. Data are mean Â± SD, * p < 0.05 vs. control. p values were 0.03, 0.007 and 0.000 for groups treated with glucose concentrations of 25, 50 and 100 mM, respectively.
